title: Kubernetes Application Integrated with Argocd, Helm, Kustomize and Gihub Actions
tagline: This project aims to deploy a WordPress application with a MySQL database on a local Kubernetes cluster using helm and kustomize for seamless configurations.

title: Provisioning the infrastructure using Terraform
tagline: This project automates the creation of resources on AWS and provides a fully customizable implementation for the networking, computing and database components of the infrastructure.

title: Provisioning & Configurating the infrastructure on AWS using Ansible
tagline: This project contains some ansible automation scripts to create a basic network on AWS and provision a machine with some specs passed through the variables.
